commit.message:
Enable underflow check in canonicalize_comparison. (PR86995)

gcc/
2018-08-30  Vlad Lazar  <vlad.lazar@arm.com>

	PR middle-end/86995
	* expmed.c (canonicalize_comparison): Use wi::sub instead of wi::add
	if to_add is negative.

From-SVN: r263973
